alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:20AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Roger Mills, northwestern Harmon, northwestern Greer and western Beckham Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 119 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Sweetwater to 7 miles southwest of Texola to near Wellington. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Erick, Sweetwater, Texola, Vinson, Madge, and Dempsey. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 0 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
